content=Free breakfast, free internet, business center & fitness center on site. Microwave and refrigerator in each guest room. Free pass to Gold's Gym, across the street from Columbiana mall, directly next door to Bailey's Sports Grill and Carmike movie theater

content=The Staybridge Suites is an extended stay hotel in downtown Columbia. Guests will enjoy free breakfast, free internet, free evening reception Monday - Thursday, and use of the indoor pool, fitness center and business center. Spacious guest rooms offer a fully equipped kitchen (microwave, refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, cooking utensils), flat screen TV and free internet.

content=The Hampton Inn Lexington accommodates business and leisure travelers visiting Columbia, South Carolina. Guests will enjoy outdoor pool, business center, fitness center, and free breakfast. Spacious guest rooms offer a microwave, refrigerator, iron, ironing board and coffee maker. Applebee's restaurant is located directly next door.
